Filter Menu

Hierarchical filter menu. All items use a base .filter-item class, but the markup differs between parent elements and actual checkable filters. Accordion functionality courtesy of Bootstrap's collapse plugin.

Show All Psychics

Specialties

Subject/Expertises

Love, Relationships & Family
Career & Finance
Life, Destiny & Meaning
Loss & Grieving

Tools

Language

Reading Style

        </a>

      <div class="filter-collapse collapse in" id="filters-show">

                    name="filter-type"
